Posts.Content: Hello   I had a sentinal node biopsy on fri (13th) and waiting for the results.  do u need any further surgery?

Posts.Content: Thank you for taking the time to reply.   Are you having any further treatment such as chemo?  I think waiting around for results is the worst bit - I suppose when you know whats what you can start to get your head around things a bit xx
